players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Charlie: "Bob was killed last night. I investigated Alice and found she is the mafia. Alice knows I'm the detective, so she must be lying. Vote Alice."
Diana: "I think Charlie is mafia because he killed Bob and claims to be detective. Alice's claim is suspicious."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice and found she is mafia. Alice knows I'm detective, so she must be lying. Bob was killed last night, so the mafia must have done it. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
